Translations.Text: When ili told Ven ki DI revealed messenger ili dir Ki ni trov our parents doing est sufficient us. Ki se their parents kon nothing ne direkt
O vi kred vi worry nur pri your own kol. others ir astray ili ne dolor vi as long as vi direkt. Al DI est your ultimate destiny all da vi tiam Li inform vi de cxio vi done

O vi kred witnessing vol when unu de vi mort done 2 equitable popol vi! Vi vojagx tiam 2 others do des witnessing! Post observ Kontakt Prayer (Salat) let witnesses jxur DI alleviate your dub Ni ne uz this ating personal gajn eben testator est rilat al us! Nor vol ni conceal di testimony. Otherwise ni est sinners

witnesses trov est kulp de bias tiam 2 others pet pren their met! Choose 2 ul victimized 1 witnesses let them jxur DI Our testimony est truthful than theirs ni ne biased Otherwise ni est transgressors
This est apt encourage honest testimony their part tim ke their oath est disregarded ke de previous witnesses Vi observ DI auxskult DI NE DIREKT DES wicked
